caption.p: Morphological alterations observed in D. indicus during transition from nutrient-rich to nutrient-depleted growth media. Overnight culture of D. indicus in NB (A) and LB (D) media was washed twice and re-inoculated in PYE medium and observed under microscope after 5 (B,E) and 18 h (C,F) incubation at 30°C. Scale bar, 10 μm.
